STBLKeyStringList.Text: (From Sleeping in the presence of Charged Amethyst)
You've created a masterpiece! Show this off to the world!
Oh no, you've botched the jewelry! Better try again...
(From Absorbing Energy From a Charged Crystal)
Thanks to the charged jade, {0.SimFirstName} has found a crystal!

Through countless hours dedicated to {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} craft, {0.SimFirstName} has become perfectly attuned with {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} crystal creations!

Trait Earned: Attuned
The crafted Jewelry {0.SimFirstName} wears will now remain charged for longer. {0.SimFirstName} is also able to Absorb Energy from charged Gemstones and Jewelry!
This Sim wants to cut gemstones, craft jewelry, and harness the power of crystals!
This will boost the speed at which your Sim gains Gemology Skill while in a Club Gathering.
{0.SimFirstName} is embracing peace of mind. Anger, sadness, shame, and fear will swiftly fade away.
{0.SimFirstName}'s been granted a continuous flow of wants.
{0.SimFirstName} feels like uncovering secrets of the past. {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} dig attempts will unearth valuable artifacts!
{0.SimFirstName}'s embracing a streak of success while sunny days brighten every step.
{0.SimFirstName} has mastered sleep! {0.SimPronounSubjective}'ll gain energy faster and can experience lucid dreams.
{0.SimFirstName} is finding Simoleons in the unlikeliest of places!
{0.SimFirstName}'s will has become more malleable, making {0.SimPronounObjective} more susceptible to be convinced to do stuff or to borrow money from.

{0.SimFirstName} is less likely to develop relationship fears, {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} romantic relationships experience less decay, and {0.SimPronounSubjective} will always succeed at Apologize in Bed!
{0.SimFirstName} was feeling the power of a charged crystal, but now that it's gone there's something missing.
{0.SimFirstName} feels sparkling, radiant, alive! There's nothing like a big sip of crystal energy to start the day—or to fuel a nightlong stargazing session.
{0.SimFirstName} is feeling inspired after experiencing a lucid dream!
{0.SimFirstName} is enjoying the simple contentedness of being near a Sim with a happy aura.
{0.SimFirstName} feels guided by {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} own wisdom. {0.SimPronounSubjective} will make impeccable choices in academic and professional pursuits.
{0.SimFirstName} is navigating romantic encounters with ease and will be a natural at romantic interactions and on dates!
{0.SimFirstName} has embarked on a journey that knows no end. It's time to embrace the gift of eternal life!
{0.SimFirstName} will find precious gems in the most unexpected places.

Through acceptance and serenity, {0.SimFirstName} is ready to face the darkest secrets of life—and death. {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent|xxUpper} special connection with the Other Side allows {0.SimPronounObjective} to summon dark forces, and bend them to {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} will.
{0.SimFirstName} revels in endless joy. {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent|xxUpper} fun moments linger and {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} tensions dissipate swiftly.
{0.SimFirstName} can now harness the full potential of {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} powers, becoming an unparalleled force of the supernatural.
{0.SimFirstName} can feel the power of the cosmos, infusing {0.SimPronounObjective} with an empowered alien energy.
{0.SimFirstName} has unleashed creativity and artistic brilliance. {0.SimPronounSubjective} will level up creative skills faster and avoid the perils of writer's block.
{0.SimFirstName} can quell a fiery temper swiftly, embracing a newfound sense of inner peace.
{0.SimFirstName} radiates happiness as all {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} motives slowly fill and spreads positivity to those around {0.SimPronounObjective}.
Every want fulfilled and aspiration satisfied rewards {0.SimFirstName} twice as much!

Bravery is {0.SimFirstName}'s middle name! Not only will {0.SimPronounSubjective} not scare easily and recover from fear faster, but {0.SimPronounSubjective}'ll also gladly hang around supernatural beings!
{0.SimFirstName}'s got nothing to lose during separation and heartbreak. Fire away, {0.SimFirstName}'s like titanium!
{0.SimFirstName} navigates romantic escapades with grace, evading embarrassment and awkward woohoo encounters.
{0.SimFirstName} feels as if {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} mind is extra sharp, allowing {0.SimPronounObjective} to build up mental skills faster.
It's time for a baby boom! {0.SimFirstName} is more likely to have twins or triplets when getting pregnant.
...but two or - oh boy - even three at once?? {0.SimFirstName} is positively shaking given the crystal energy that could make that possibility a reality.
{0.SimFirstName} is climbing professional and academic ladders with remarkable speed, making homework and promotions a breeze!
{0.SimFirstName} is just oozing charm, building charisma skill faster, and captivating other Sims effortlessly with {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} charming aura.
{0.SimFirstName}'s grasp of Gemology is improving faster due to solid mentorship!

By: Crystal Stone\n\nAssuming you know the basics of Gemology, this advanced book unearths the ways in which the precise and scientific world of gems intersects with the aesthetic one of jewelry-making. It's full of practical ways to practice and improve the entire journey from raw crystal to finished piece.
Gemology Vol 3: The Subtle Art of Jewelry Making
By: Crystal Stone\n\nA meticulous catalog of various gemstone cuts and their uses, sprinkled liberally with some secret Gemology tips and tricks!

We all know the feeling when your favorite encyclopedia is just out of reach. Thanks to this magnificent piece, the days of balancing atop creaky old chairs and perilously balanced crates are over! The sturdy ladder puts your entire collection at your fingertips, while simultaneously adding a sophisticated touch to your office.

No office is complete without a gorgeously crafted bookcase. Fill this beauty with every ancient and esoteric manuscript under the moon! Or, you know, stuff it full with romance novels. Whatever makes you happy!
A stack of Gemology Skill books for display in retail stores.
A stack of thin Gemology Skill books for display in retail stores.
By: Crystal Stone\n\nLearn the basics of gems, including where to find them, how to cut them into pleasing shapes, and their usage in pieces of jewelry.
A soft green stone, Jade is treasured by many.
Moonstone produces a characteristic bluish interior light called schiller, which derived its name.
The fossilized sap of ancient trees, Amber's translucent golden color looks like delicious honey - but you mustn't eat it. It is forbidden.

This collectible display comes complete with a plaque, some wood, and a hefty pile of gold. Show off your collecting prowess proudly and let everyone know that you don't just collect some things, you collect all of them.

This collectible display comes complete with a plaque, some wood, and a hefty pile of rose gold. Show off your collecting prowess proudly and let everyone know that you don't just collect some things, you collect all of them.

This collectible display comes complete with a plaque, some wood, and a hefty pile of silver. Show off your collecting prowess proudly and let everyone know that you don't just collect some things, you collect all of them.
Gold is a bright, slightly orange-yellow, dense, soft, malleable, and ductile metal in pure form.

Rose gold is a gold–copper alloy widely used for specialized jewelry. The difference between red, rose, and pink gold is the copper content: the higher the copper content, the stronger the red coloration.
Silver is a soft, white, lustrous transition metal, it exhibits the highest electrical conductivity, thermal conductivity, and reflectivity of any metal.
For all the basic babes out there.
Plant this bracelet on your wrist to unleash your inner trendsetter.
There are no mistakes. Only happy accidents.
Destroy nations - and your lovers' hearts - with this elegant gauntlet-style bracelet.
Yes, it's cool you said all that. Yes, it's chill they're in your head. You're wearing the delicate bracelet.
Let everyone see into your soul–on your wrist!
A bracelet beloved by the Charm family in Glimmerbrook.
Make waves and change the tides with this celestial bracelet.
A household brand that will remain timeless.
Toast the town with this bracelet. Raw materials complement any glass of nectar.
Everyone across the cosmos will be in jealous awe of your style wearing this bracelet!
These earrings are basically the best option for any event.
I want to, like, rob these earrings.
Mother Nature never looked so good with these earrings.
These chakram-style earrings are dangerously stylish.
Your reputation will never be better than when you wear these delicate earrings.
An extra pair of eyes, for your ears!
Bring any party back to life with these sensational earrings.
You'll look like an Amicable Acolyte in these earrings!
Over purple seas and blue skies, these celestial earrings are perfect for capturing the moonlight.
The only thing better than one plumbob? Two plumbobs!
Full of raw beauty, these earrings are the bee's knees.
Every outfit simply transforms into a thing of beauty when wearing the Starry Sailor Earrings. Minicomputer headset not included.
Simply put? This gemstone cut is brilliant.
A smooth, round shape that celebrates the natural brilliance of a crystal.
What came first, the crystal or the gemstone cut?
Assert your superiority over the neighborhood with a gnome made entirely of crystal!
Someday, somewhere, somehow, you'll love again - you just need to find someone.
Despite its name, do NOT eat the gemstone!
Something about this gemstone cut feels like it would work well attached to a headband.
Gaze into the multicolored depths of this mystical seed and just imagine what kind of wondrous plant will grow from it!
Your own mini crystal tower that an exarch would be proud of.
Clutch it in your hand, hold it up in the sky, and shout "make up!" ...Did it work?
With enough skill and the right touch, a beautiful ring, bracelet, or pair of earrings will emerge.
For all the basic babes out there.
Even though you stole this necklace from Judith Ward, you look better in it.
It was always supposed to look like this. Definitely.
A necklace fit for the gods. Use its power wisely.
They'll dream of you in this necklace. They'll pretend you're theirs. This necklace is delicate.
Look into your heart, and know that actually, it's an eye.
The perfect necklace for fitting in with the locals of Glimmerbrook.
Eternally elegant. Everyone will remember the night you wore this stunning celestial necklace.
This raw necklace is the cat's pajamas.
A necklace so beautiful, it will make you believe in the power of love.
The perfect piece to complement that pumpkin spice latte you're holding.
A ring so gorgeous, you'll need to lock it up safe and sound if you don't want anyone to steal it.
Don't make promises but drinks with this exquisite ring.
So luminescent, you'll see your real reflection.
Morgyn Ember called; they want this ring!
Light up the night with this celestial ring.
What should we say about this ring? I'm plum out of ideas, Bob.
Every miracle romance needs a perfect proposal ring. The Starry Sailor Ring is the jewelry piece for the job!

Do you have some odds and ends you want out of your house? Selling off the belongings of a Sim no longer here? Setting up for a craft fair to sell your handmade jewelry? The Classically Cool Sales Table will get the job done!

The power of the moon is a phenomenon still shrouded in mystery to this day; its influence on the human world is undeniable. Harness this power yourself by charging your very own crafted jewelry or gemstones and experimenting with its mystical effects. But beware, there could be undesirable results...

You'll spend more time at this desk organizing it than you will working at it. There's plenty of pigeon-holes to put everything precisely in place. A draw for your jade, a compartment for your copper, a nook for your nickel, a slot for your silver, an alcove for your agate.
A tree that... grows crystals? Nature truly is a wonder!

We all have dreams of turning our hobbies into a flourishing business, and Humphrey Inc. knows that all too well! This all-in-one solution offers a precise turntable and a wide workspace with a premium faux-leather mat. A design so chic it will perfectly incorporate into any crafter's studio! Cut your favorite gems into perfectly imperfect works of art and craft the perfect jewel for every occasion.
The All-In-One Gemology Table By Humphrey Inc.
The very beginning of something special is starting to take shape as the natural materials are formed into something great.
What better way to enjoy your crystal creations than in the perfect light. With this spotlight at your disposal, you could be the star and your jewelry will shine so bright.
While it may not provide the best light for late night gem cutting sessions, this elegant piece certainly sets the ambiance.

Crafted from glass forged by the breath of dragons and framed by gold dug from the deepest caves, this mirror will reflect the shine that not only comes from your physical beauty but your inner gut health. The Dawnstone of Cordelia that crowns this mirror gives the design a whimsical touch that will add sparkle to any room.

This fantastical poster set meticulously maps the crystallographic forms of the common gems in our world. Every prismatic fissure and iridescence lamination captured in full detail. Created by top scholars in Glimmerbrook, these prints are essential for any budding gemologist or hobbyist crystal bearer alike.

With this set of Limited Edition prints on your wall, you will never find yourself wondering about the phases of the moon or the lunar alignment again! The set comes in three beautiful colorways to fit the ambience of any room.
There's something almost magical about this fern. Even when you forget to water it, it stays lush and green. Not a crispy leaf in sight!
The perfect piece to complement that pumpkin spice latte you're holding.
A ring so gorgeous, you'll need to lock it up safe and sound if you don't want anyone to steal it.
Don't make promises but drinks with this exquisite ring.
So luminescent, you'll see your real reflection.
Light up the night with this celestial ring.
What should we say about this ring? I'm plum out of ideas, Bob.
As above, so below. Ground yourself and balance the energies of your space with this beautiful handwoven rug.
If you thought the Gemologist's Field Kit was impressive, just wait until you upgrade your setup to the Gemologist's Field Box! More space for more great crystal finds!
Anyone can become an at-home gemologist with the Gemologist's Field Kit! Put it on display to tell all your friends about this new hobby.

Gemtacular! is back with a jewelry box that's sure to be a shiny conversation piece the next time guests are over. It has plenty of compartments and a drawer for storing all of your beautiful jewelry and a crystal clear mirror for showing all of your beautiful self.
Take a closer look at all your works in progress with the dependable, sturdy Jeweler's Tray.
The perfect display box for all the pretty little pieces of your jewelry collection.

While the scientists at FutureSim Labs have no idea how it works, there's no denying plants grow faster in the vicinity of charged crystals! In this hexagonal vivarium, we have combined the highest quality quartz with lush moss and succulents.

Let your crafted necklaces dazzle against this linen bust modeled after Princess Cordelia herself. The craftsmanship of this stand is of the highest quality, and there is no better way to showcase your masterpieces.

Become the sharpest tool in the shed with this wall rack. You don't have to worry about the years that won't stop coming, these tools are made to last a lifetime. With a wide selection of gemology gear at your disposal, you can show the world that all that glitters are not necessarily gold.

In a previous life, this stately cabinet housed an impressive set of fine china, but now it has stood empty for many years. It longs to be filled once more, to display something of great beauty. Will you fulfill its wish?

Ethically sourced finials salvaged from the roofs of dilapidated, decrepit, and decaying Victorian mansions have found a second purpose in life. Just a quick flip - turned upside down they serve as shelving for all manners of oddities, curiosities, doohickeys, and collectibles.
There's nothing quite like a bit of illumination to make you feel shelf aware.

Unlike its more dignified cousins, this shelf shows an astounding lack of dignity. No glass to protect the items it's displaying nor to prevent a buildup of dust on its surfaces? Indeed, no! Everything is just out there on full naked display to the world. What crude frivolity!

You've mastered the art of building virtual tetrominoes... Now, thanks to Shelving by Blicblock you can bring all the fun of Blicblock to your home's walls! Masterfully craft and arrange the five free tetrominoes into stunning displays, and then fill them with your most precious collectibles for a one-of-a-kind display!

Not to be mistaken for the many armchairs designed for professors, this armchair actually is a professor. That's right, it has an honorary degree from the University of Britechester! It teaches an elective course on Gemology! It consistently gets poor ratings from its students who mainly complain about the lack of instruction and the fact that "the teacher for this course was a literal chair!"

Sometimes you may feel like you need to run away or get away from the pain, but instead may we suggest sharing some love with the Tufted Love(seat), a two-seater with pleasing patterns and comfort to spare. Over time, as it holds you tight, it may get some tears but that's not nearly all!
No matter how much you polish this, the fingerprints will always find a way to elude you.

When working diligently in the workshop, yearning for a break to drink some soda pop, the kitchen seems more than a skip, jump, and hop, so soon the idea is one you drop.\n\nAlas! If only you owned the Workshop Perk Stop!

This nondescript table is the perfect entryway piece to display your handcrafted trinkets. Wow your guests the second they walk into your home and shine brighter than any diamond as you say "oh, I made that myself." Or alarm the neighbors with your ever-growing collection of crystal skulls. No matter your pearlescent preferences, this understated table complements them all.

Jewelry and Gemstones hold mysterious powers from the Crystals that were made to craft them. To unlock these powers, you need to charge your creations on your new Crystal Grid.\n\nDo you want to learn more about Crystal Charging?

Craft custom Jewelry and Gemstones at your new Gemology Tablewith the Gemology Skill! Discover mysterious powers and decorate your home and body with crystal creations.\n\nDo you want to learn more about the Gemology Skill?
This piece of jewelry has no crystal to charge
Botched jewelry has no crystal to charge
{0.SimFirstName} has no gemstones or jewelry to charge.
There is no room on the crystal grid for more gemstones or jewelry.
{0.SimFirstName} has recently Absorbed Energy from a crystal.
Requires a Gemology Table to be placed on lot.
Gemology Table needs to be empty.
In Sim or Gemology Table Inventory
Who needs fun when you have Jonquilyst?
Diamonds can make staying in love easier!
All your needs become an afterthought when you've got some Plumbite!
Having trouble getting a good night's sleep? Amethyst can help!
Get yourself some Jade and it can help you find more crystals! It's like the circle of life, but with crystals.
Hoping for twins or triplets? Shinolite can help!
Hematite helps you say, "Not today, Grim!"
Not saying you'll be instant besties with Grim, but a little Jet can entice him to visit.
Moonstone makes life less boring, especially for occult Sims.
Fire Opals ignite the passionate heart, making anyone a natural flirt and a great date!
Want to boost your creativity? Get yourself some Orange Topaz!
Socializing and gaining charisma is a snap with Turquoise.
All of {0.SimFirstName}'s jewelry is currently being worn.
This is a Gemology skill book.
I Don't Carat All: Gemology for Everyone
Amber is composed primarily of Crytacoo, with a large amount of Melacoo as well.
Jade is composed of primarily of Goobleck, though it has some Plathium as well.
Moonstone is half Wolfium and half Selium.
Gold is composed primarily of Volenton with some Alcineat as well.
Rose Gold is composed primarily of Volenton with some Firaxium as well.
Silver is composed of equal parts Sydrolin and Oxypin.
Place up to 7 Gemstones or Jewelry Pieces on a Crystal Grid that is outdoors between 7pm and 7am to charge them and unlock their hidden powers.
The Crystal Grid can hold up to 7 pieces of jewelry or gemstones.
The Crystal Grid must be placed outdoors for it to charge the Gemstones and Jewelry on it.
This item cannot be shipped until it is taken off of all outfits.
Purchase the Mystical Moonlight Crystal Grid in the Outdoor Activities category in Buy Mode.

Use the Dig interaction on rocks found around the Neighborhoods for a chance to discover Crystals and Metals. At Gemology Skill level 3, Sims can also cut a Crystal Seed, plant it, and collect Crystals once it grows into a Crystal Tree.
Being in the Focused mood and crafting Designs from a lower Gemology skill level than the Sim's current level increases the chance of crafting something of Excellent quality.
Selecting a high skill level Cut and a Rare Crystal while in a Focused mood will contribute to a high Gemstone value.
Complete Crafting Gemstones or Jewelry {1.Number} Times While Focused
Get into the Focused mood and craft something at the Gemology Table. Wearing charged Jewelry made with Emerald, Quartz, or Sapphire is a good way to get Focused.
Buy The All-In-One Gemology Table By Humphrey Inc. from the Creative section of the Activities and Skills category in Build Mode.
Cut Gemstones and Design Jewelry to level up your Gemology skill.
Gift Jewelry or Successfully Propose with Crafted Ring
Use the interaction Gift to on a crafted piece of Jewelry and select someone to gift it to. Alternatively, select the interaction Propose to on a crafted Ring (requires a Girlfriend/Boyfriend).

To Evolve your Crystal Tree to the Magnificent level, make sure to take care of its needs and use the Evolve interaction when it becomes available. You can see your progress in the Tree's tooltip. Fertilizing your Crystal Tree (available at Gardening level 3) will speed up the process!
Seed-Shaped Gemstones can be crafted at a Gemology Table (requires level 3 Gemology skill) and planted on the ground outside or in a large planter.
Summon the Grim Reaper with Jet Gemstone or Jewelry
Craft a Gemstone or Jewelry Piece using the crystal Jet. Charge it on the Crystal Grid and use the interaction Summon Grim Reaper.
Wear a Fully Charged Jewelry Piece

Crafted Jewelry can be charged by putting it on a Crystal Grid placed outside between 7pm and 7am. When the tooltip shows the Jewelry is fully charged with a magical glow, wear it to unleash its powers!
Experience Power from a Charged Crystal
Charge a Gemstone or Jewelry Piece on the Crystal Grid, and wear the Jewelry or be nearby the Gemstone to experience its power.
Click on a Gemology Table, Select Design Jewelry, and select a Design, Metal, and Crystal.
Click on a Gemology Table, select Cut Gemstone, and select a Design and Crystal.

Looking at these crystals and metals, {0.SimFirstName} isn't really feeling it. They seem more like just a bunch of rocks than anything special. Does this mean that {0.SimFirstName} Dislikes Gemology?

As {0.SimFirstName} stares into the various angles and cuts of the crystal in front of {0.SimPronounObjective}, the universe seems to stare back. Is it fate? Should {0.SimPronounSubjective} take this as a sign that {0.SimFirstName} Likes Gemology?
<font color="#1e81e6">• Angry, Embarrassed, Sad, and Scared moodlets will fade much faster</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim's wants will refresh more often</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim excavating in Selvadorada will unearth rarer and more valuable artifacts</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim will not fail at a range of interactions\n• Sim will not start a fire when cooking\n• The weather will become sunny</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim gains energy faster when sleeping\n• Sim has a chance to wake up with an Inspired Lucid Dream moodlet</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim will randomly find Simoleons doing things around the house</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim is easier to convince and more likely to lend money</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim is less likely to develop relationship fears\n• Sim will have less romantic relationship decay with other Sims\n• Sim will always succeed at Apologizing in Bed</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Career and school chance cards are more likely to succeed</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim is more successful with romantic socials\n• Sim can complete dates more successfully</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim will randomly find crystals doing things around the house</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim can summon the Grim Reaper at will\n• Sim will always succeed when pleading for someone's life</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim's Fun need does not decay\n• Tense moodlets will fade much faster</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Bored moodlets will disappear much faster</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Energy need decays slightly slower\n• Sim's alien powers recharge faster once depleted</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim gains creative skills faster\n• Sim is more likely to create masterpieces\n• Sim will not experience writer's block</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• A Sim's relationships with family members increase faster\n• Angry moodlets will fade much faster</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim's needs increase slowly over time\n• Sim will make others around them happy</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim gains double satisfaction points when completing wants or aspirations</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim is much less likely to develop a fear\n• Sim gains all benefits of the Brave reward trait</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim gets over breakups faster\n• Sim's Social need does not decay</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Embarrassed moodlets will fade much faster\n• Sim will not have uncomfortable romantic interactions\n• Sim will not have awkward woohoo encounters</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim gains mental skills faster</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim is more likely to give birth to twins or triplets</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim gains work or school performance faster\n• Sim can complete homework faster</font>
<font color="#1e81e6">• Sim gains Charisma skill faster\n• Sim is more successful with friendly socials</font>
{0.SimFirstName} is now more likely to find crystals and metals when digging at rocks, and can design Lunar Goddess jewelry and cut Seed-shaped gemstones at the Gemology Table.
{0.SimFirstName} will now get additional crystals and metals when digging at rocks, and can design Mystical jewelry and cut Star-shaped gemstones at the Gemology Table.

{0.SimFirstName} has begun {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} journey into the Gemology skill! Use the Gemology Table to cut gemstones and craft jewelry, or collect crystals and metals to level up and unlock more jewelry and gemstones designs to craft!
{0.SimFirstName} can now design Eye jewelry and cut Pear-shaped gemstones at the Gemology Table.
{0.SimFirstName} can now design Edwardian Gothic jewelry and cut Heart-shaped gemstones at the Gemology Table.

{0.SimFirstName} has mastered Gemology! {0.SimPronounSubjective} can now craft Jewelry and Gemstones at record breaking speeds, and can design Plumbob jewelry and cut Gnome-shaped gemstones at the Gemology Table.
{0.SimFirstName} now gets even more extra crystals and metals when digging at rocks, and can design Starry Sailor jewelry and cut Plumbob-shaped gemstones at the Gemology Table.
{0.SimFirstName} now crafts Jewelry and Gemstones even faster, and can design Botanical jewelry and cut Skull-shaped gemstones at the Gemology Table.
{0.SimFirstName} will now craft Jewelry and Gemstones faster, and can design Bling jewelry and cut Brilliant-cut gemstones at the Gemology Table.
{0.SimFirstName} can now Discuss Crystal Properties with other Sims, and can design Delicate jewelry and cut Emerald gemstones at the Gemology Table.

While every Sim may appreciate a shiny gem, those with Gemology skill learn to create their own gem-based creations for wearing, gifting, or turning a little profit.\n\nGemology is built primarily by crafting on the Gemology Table, supplemented by finding metals and crystals. Increasing this skill will unlock new jewelry designs and gemstone cuts, as well as increase the number of metals and crystals a Sim finds!
Attuned Sims have great insights into the mysteries of crystals. The jewelry they wear will remain charged for longer, and they can absorb energy from charged crystals.

The Crystal Grid charging speed ebbs and flows with the phases of the moon. The full moon will charge your Gemstones and Jewelry in no time, but expect longer charging times during the new moon.\n\nThere are special places, like Sylvan Glade and Forgotten Grotto, where the Crystal Grid can charge all day.

Gemstones and Jewelry crafted with crystals can be charged to unlock the crystal’s innate power! Each crystal has unique properties to discover, from boosting skills and relationships to lucid dreams and power over Death itself!\n\nAll you need is the Mystical Moonlight Crystal Grid and some moonlight.

Sims that complete the Crystal Crafter Aspiration will be rewarded with the Attuned trait. Their worn Jewelry will lose charge slower. They can also use the interaction Absorb Energy on a charged Gemstone or Jewelry piece to drain its charge in exchange for a boost to their Energy need.

The power of a charged Gemstone or Jewelry piece depends on what crystal it was made from. Each crystal has a unique power. Gemstones will spread their power to everyone closeby. Jewelry will give their power to the Sim wearing it with their current outfit. Sims under the influence of a charged crystal will get a special Moodlet. Read the description to learn more about its powers! Most Crystal powers have a passive effect, but items crafted with Jet also have a special interaction on the item itself.

Place your Gemstones and Jewelry on a Crystal Grid outdoors between 7pm and 7am to charge them. You can do this by dragging items to the Grid, by selecting Charge Items on the Grid, or selecting Charge on Crystal Grid on the Gemstone or Jewelry piece.\n\nThe Crystal Grid has a helpful tooltip which explains if it is charging or not, what speed it is charging at, and the status of the individual items on the Grid. You can also look out for the magical glow of a fully charged crystal!

When you're done charging your Gemstones and Jewelry, you can pick them up from the Crystal Grid and place it in your Sim's home or inventory, or make your Sim wear them.\n\nGemstones will start to lose their charge as soon as they stop charging. Jewelry only loses its charge when worn with the Sim's current outfit. You can check the tooltip of the item to see how much charge is remaining.

You can find Crystals and Metals by digging at rocks found across the Neighborhoods. The areas around the Parks in Oasis Springs and Willow Creek are great places to start!\n\nOnce your Sim reaches Gemology Skill level 3, they can cut a Crystal Seed and plant it to grow a Crystal Tree. The more you take care of and evolve the tree, the rarer Crystals it will produce!

Design and craft your own custom Jewelry and cut dazzling Gemstones with the Gemology Skill. Decorate your Sims and their homes, make buckets of Simoleons, and discover the hidden power of crystals!\n\nAll you need to get started is The All-In-One Gemology Table By Humphrey Inc. from the Creative subcategory under Activities and Skills in Build Mode.

Select Design Jewelry on the Gemology Table to start making your own Jewelry. Customize it by selecting a design, a metal, and a crystal (if applicable). To make Gemstones, select Cut Gemstones on the Gemology Table, and combine a cut with a crystal. Increase your Sim's Gemology Skill to unlock new Jewelry designs and Gemstone cuts.

You can make a pretty Simoleon by selling crafted Jewelry and Gemstones! Their value depends on the unlock level of the design, the Quality of the piece, and the rarity of the crystal and metals used.\n\nSims that are in the Focused mood have a higher chance of creating high Quality pieces.
Both Gemstones and Jewelry can be charged to unlock their innate powers! Check out the Crystal Charging lesson to learn more.

If the ingredients chosen are available in the inventory of the Sim or the Gemology Table, they will be used in the crafting process. This reduces the crafting cost.\n\nCommon and uncommon crystals and metals that your Sim doesn't already have can be bought directly in the crafting menu. Rare crystals and metals have to be acquired beforehand to craft with them.

To have your Sim wear crafted Jewelry, select either Wear with Current Outfit or Wear with All Outfits under the Wear category on the Jewelry item. Now your Sim will wear the piece with the selected outfit(s) until they remove it from one or all outfits.\n\nThis will replace any Jewelry in the same slot. Sims may wear several rings or bracelets, as long as they're on different wrists or fingers!

Your Sim can gift crafted Jewelry to other Sims! Put the Jewelry in your Sim's inventory, and select the Gift to interaction on the Jewelry piece. You can also use the interaction Gift Jewelry on other Sims in the Friendly social pie menu, then Affection. The Sim receiving the gift will wear their new Jewelry with their current outfit.

If the Jewelry piece is in the world, your Sim will pick it up and add it to their inventory first. Wearable Jewelry will have a special icon on it, which turns green when the piece is worn with any outfit.\n\nOnce your Sim has put on crafted Jewelry in Live Mode, you can take it off and put it on again in Create a Sim.

Sims can use a crafted Ring to propose to their Boyfriend or Girlfriend! Put it in their inventory and use the Propose to interaction on the Ring, or the Propose with Crafted Ring interaction on their partner in the Romance category. The Sim who gets proposed to will wear their new Ring with all outfits.
Boost your day with the power of crystals!
The only thing better than a shiny, new jewelry piece is a shiny, new jewelry piece that you crafted yourself.
Is there anything more rewarding than taking a raw crystal and revealing its inner beauty through the perfect cut?
